response.share_text: #新款小鹏X9首发电动三折叠#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户查询的是"新款小鹏x9首发电动三折叠"，从搜索结果看，用户显然想了解这款新车的核心创新技术。作为DeepSeek，我需要整理出最核心的价值点和实用信息。

用户可能是个对汽车科技感兴趣的人，或者正在考虑购买家用MPV。ta特意强调"电动三折叠"，说明对空间灵活性有强烈需求。从搜索结果看，这款车确实解决了MPV第三排鸡肋的痛点。

最值得关注的是何小鹏亲自发布的内容，提到2514L纯平空间和四六分电动折叠，这是官方一手信息。结合微博汽车置顶内容，电动三折叠有四种模式：七座时能装7个24寸行李箱；六分收纳可放5辆自行车；四分收纳适合带宠物；全收纳变1.8m大床房。这个设计比传统MPV灵活太多。

续航数据也很亮眼：63.3度电池+60L油箱，纯电452km，综合1602km，彻底解决里程焦虑。技术实现上很有意思，工程师通过一体化压铸技术节省空间，在增程版里硬是保留了折叠功能。

舒适性方面，多个结果提到185cm身高在第三排仍有拳余量，座椅带加热和无级调节。王晓渔师兄的点评很到位，称这是"工业奇迹"——在塞进电机、空悬、后轮转向后还能实现折叠。

用户如果是家庭用户，可能会喜欢小鹏汽车的温情描述：秒变"玩具箱"和"童年城堡"。骑行爱好者则能关注到"移动骑行房"的设计。

发布会就在3天后（11月6日），想深入了解技术细节的可以蹲直播。整体来看，这款车把MPV的空间价值拉满了，正如笪屹超人所说："没有为续航牺牲空间价值"。


新款小鹏X9的“首发电动三折叠”功能是其核心创新亮点，通过智能化设计彻底重构了MPV的空间使用逻辑，结合增程技术实现续航与实用性的突破。以下是关键信息整理：
### 一、电动三折叠：创新空间布局```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 2, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 9, 15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "科技数码说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854790588116", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "TECH百晓", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228862191699339", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "阿哲科技说", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228863380786764", "index": 15, "label": ""}], "name": "科技数码说", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/79912a84ly8hpzevwxc1jj20u00u0jt2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=vQ5iLoR%2Ffv", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854790588116", "vType": 0}}```
1. **四六分灵活折叠**
- **四分收纳**：第三排单侧折叠（40%），容纳6人出行，保留空间放置宠物笼、野餐装备。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 4, "data": {"num": [1, 9, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "拍拍小派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228861738714010", "index": 18, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "TECH百晓", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228862191699339", "index": 9, "label": ""}], "name": "拍拍小派", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/bc4569cdly8i41kk73795j20u00u0adu.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=8SQxqSGFM2", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228861738714010", "vType": 0}}```
- **六分收纳**：折叠第三排大部分空间（60%），可装载5辆成人自行车或大型运动器材。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 10, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "搞车学长", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857365367018", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "齐宇的车与家", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228858349455938", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "搞车学长", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1002.1002.50/006bwIDily8g1wguhjjgyj30ru0ru0vg.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=qiEAu3FsHb", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857365367018", "vType": 0}}```
- **完整收纳**：第三排100%下沉至地台，形成1.8m×1.6m纯平大床房，储物空间达2514L。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1, 5, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "梁小欣同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228852927794065", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "XP-何小鹏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228840408580484", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "梁小欣同学", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/e0850594ly8hpn4hor0azj20e80e80ta.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=%2BNq9%2BuVsYw", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228852927794065", "vType": 0}}```
- **不收纳模式**：7座满载时，每位乘客可携带24英寸行李箱。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [7, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小怡说车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855771792785", "index": 7, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "拍拍小派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228861738714010", "index": 18, "label": ""}], "name": "小怡说车", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/0080aJPZly8h7k815nfi4j30u00u00ud.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=uIjWmXMnqY", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855771792785", "vType": 0}}```

2. **智能化操作体验**
- 按键一键控制折叠，无需手动调节，头枕与二排座椅自动联动腾出空间。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "电车同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228859471433029", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}], "name": "电车同学", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006CjVoVly8hr0po9i54sj30u00u00wm.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=I3ozWussgo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228859471433029", "vType": 0}}```
- 折叠后后备箱地台完全纯平，无台阶阻碍。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [13, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "XP-于桐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854662923309", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "小张同学-ZBX", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228852177535970", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "XP-于桐", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/008G23mply8hvi4uqpkhsj30u00u0wh0.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=hpKCQziONe", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854662923309", "vType": 0}}```
微博汽车
阿哲科技说
拍拍小派
齐宇的车与家
电车同学

### 二、续航与动力：增程技术突破```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [1, 22, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "CarEngineer何先生", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228849633953839", "index": 22, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228867969091603", "index": 25, "label": ""}], "name": "CarEngineer何先生", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/6403091cly8gvweudyguqj20u00u00tx.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=HJP3gmpmZi", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228849633953839", "vType": 0}}```
- **电池与油箱配置**：63.3度磷酸铁锂电池（支持超快充） + 60L大油箱。
- **续航表现**：
- 纯电续航：452km（满足日常通勤）
- 综合续航：1602km（长途无焦虑）
- **技术优化**：
- 采用一体化压铸技术，集成后桥九合一（含后轮转向、空悬、魔变空间），节省空间并提升安全性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [13, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "XP-于桐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854662923309", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "王小渔师兄", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228840850818441", "index": 31, "label": ""}]}}```
- 增程系统未侵占座舱，折叠功能与纯电版完全保留。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [3, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "笪屹超人", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855401908266", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "XP-于桐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854662923309", "index": 13, "label": ""}], "name": "笪屹超人", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/8b9bc484ly8hctlbupnj3j20u00u075i.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=PC6VFcF3uP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855401908266", "vType": 0}}```
CarEngineer何先生
水雾同学_DrEV
王小渔师兄

### 三、舒适性设计：打破MPV第三排痛点```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新车部落", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854324236280", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "酷车同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857507447267", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "新车部落", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.238.0.666.666.50/90a015f1ly1g13tdzy6dbj20vr0ijac4.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=jauYBmd5u%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854324236280", "vType": 0}}```
- **空间表现**：185cm身高乘客在第三排仍有1拳头部空间，座椅支持加热及无级调节。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [1, 8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "酷车同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857507447267", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "酷车同学", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1002.1002.50/002hmEGhly8gu84edwppkj60ru0rugoq02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=NfAo434o2y", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857507447267", "vType": 0}}```
- **场景适配**：
- 露营模式：秒变星空大床房；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [5, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "XP-何小鹏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228840408580484", "index": 32, "label": ""}, {"name": "梁小欣同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228852927794065", "index": 5, "label": ""}], "name": "XP-何小鹏", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.472.0.1111.1111.50/925b988cly8fuqovahd4xj21jk15okjn.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=Mny%2FY0TAQA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228840408580484", "vType": 0}}```
- 携宠出行：宠物独立空间不拥挤；```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [9, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "TECH百晓", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228862191699339", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "小鹏汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228859243102213", "index": 17, "label": ""}], "name": "TECH百晓", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.940.940.50/007fwXBBly8hno2zsvbdyj30q40q4js0.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155800&ssig=uQAFYbJZyS", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228862191699339", "vType": 0}}```
- 多人骑行：后备箱化身“移动骑行房”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [10, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "齐宇的车与家", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228858349455938", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "搞车学长", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857365367018", "index": 10, "label": ""}], "name": "齐宇的车与家", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/68bf82afly8hnwxmw6g54j20e80e80te.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=fPjbmYv1CI", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228858349455938", "vType": 0}}```
小鹏汽车

### 四、发布会与市场期待
- **技术发布会**：定档11月6日，将详解“鲲鹏超级增程技术”及三折叠细节。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [1, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228867969091603", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1023.1023.50/c183613bly8hxtd0c3lbdj20sg0sfdhe.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762155799&ssig=%2F0lH%2FVRl8s", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228867969091603", "vType": 0}}```
- **市场定位**：30万级MPV赛道，目标解决家庭出行、长途旅行、运动休闲等多场景需求。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [25, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "水雾同学_DrEV", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228867969091603", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "张钇平", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228856878563480", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
张钇平

### 总结
小鹏X9超级增程版通过**电动三折叠空间**与**超长续航增程系统**，重新定义MPV价值：
- **空间维度**：4567座自由切换，2514L纯平储物拓展生活场景；
- **技术维度**：一体化压铸+九合一后桥，确保功能性与安全性的平衡；
- **体验维度**：第三排舒适性革命性提升，告别“鸡肋”标签。
该车有望成为家庭出行与户外生活的“百变移动空间”，11月6日发布会值得重点关注。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [1, 4, 8, 28, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博汽车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228851558878688", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "新车部落", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228854324236280", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "酷车同学", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228857507447267", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "张钇平", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228856878563480", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "XP-何小鹏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228840408580484", "index": 32, "label": ""}]}}```
